name: Mystery Box VR (Oculus - VR Game)
description:
Click here to download the game  on the Meta Quest Store (App lab)

Mystery Box VR is a puzzle game where you have to interact with bizarre mechanisms, think out of the box to crack odd riddles, and gain your freedom.

You can play this game in Standing mode, using joysticks to rotate around the box, or in Roomscale mode, walking around the tables (best game experience).

If you get stuck on solving a puzzle, hit the A or X button on the controller to get a hint.

Step into the unknown, be a mastermind in an exciting adventure!

Are you up for the challenge?

Click here to download the game  on the Meta Quest Store (App lab)
